mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.title, i.description, i.severity, i.priority, i.issue_status, i.env, i.browser, i.test_device, i.create_time, i.update_time, i.project_id, i.case_category, i.found_after_release, i.issue_version, i.introduced_version, i.is_legacy, i.fix_version, i.runcase_id FROM issue i WHERE i.runcase_id = #{runCaseId}

SELECT i.id, i.title, i.description, i.severity, i.priority, i.issue_status, i.env, i.browser, i.test_device, i.create_time, i.update_time, i.project_id, i.case_category, i.found_after_release, i.issue_version, i.introduced_version, i.is_legacy, i.fix_version, i.runcase_id FROM issue i WHERE i.runcase_id IN
#{runCaseId}

SELECT i.id as defect_id, i.title as defect_title, i.description as defect_description, i.severity, i.priority, i.issue_status, i.env, i.browser, i.test_device, i.create_time as defect_create_time,
tc.id as test_case_id, tc.title as test_case_title, tc.version as test_case_version,
tcycle.id as test_cycle_id, tcycle.title as test_cycle_title, tcycle.env as test_cycle_env, tcycle.version as test_cycle_version,
tcjtc.id as run_case_id, tcjtc.run_status as execution_status, tcjtc.run_count, tcjtc.update_time as execution_time
FROM issue i INNER JOIN test_cycle_join_test_case tcjtc ON i.runcase_id = tcjtc.id INNER JOIN test_case tc ON tcjtc.test_case_id = tc.id INNER JOIN test_cycle tcycle ON tcjtc.test_cycle_id = tcycle.id
WHERE tc.project_id = #{projectId} AND tc.version = #{majorVersion} AND tcycle.version IN
#{version}
AND tcjtc.test_cycle_id IN
#{cycleId}
ORDER BY i.id, tcjtc.id
